text: Hello and welcome everyone.

text: This is March 31st, 2023's quarterly roundtable number one from the Active Inference Institute.

text: Welcome to the Active Inference Institute.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: We're a participatory online institute that is communicating, learning, and practicing applied active inference.

text: You can find us at the links on this slide.
